import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { Book } from 'src/app/models/book'; @Component({ selector: 'app-card', templateUrl: './card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./card.component.css'] }) export class CardComponent { @Input() book: Book; @Output() selectBook = new EventEmitter(); deleteBook():void{ this.selectBook.emit(this.book.title) } }

{{book.title}}

  • {{book.author}}
  • {{book.price}} €
  • {{book.type}}
{{book.id_book| pipeBook}}
